text: satyaviśvāsikaḷē, niṅṅaḷ rahasyasambhāṣaṇaṁ naṭattukayāṇeṅkil adharm'mattinuṁ atikramattinuṁ ṟasūline dhikkarikkunnatinuṁ niṅṅaḷ rahasyasambhāṣaṇaṁ naṭattarut‌. puṇyattinṟeyuṁ bhayabhaktiyuṭeyuṁ kāryattil niṅṅaḷ rahasya'upadēśaṁ naṭattuka. ēteāru allāhuviṅkalēkk niṅṅaḷ orumiccukūṭṭappeṭumēā avane niṅṅaḷ sūkṣikkukayuṁ ceyyuka
